tagLine: "We can be the Pretty Heroes if we try"
description: Make a simple, colorful and personal "About me" page, straight from your GitHub !

errDesc.fetchError: Check if either hero.toml or pronounce.yml is accessible from their Git !
errDesc.missingData: Some variables are unreferenced. If you're the author of this here, please fill them in !
errDesc.unknownError: I've... never seen this one coming... Please create an issue on GitHub...
